languages.text: {n}Лишь одно тревожило слуг Вольного Торговца. В главном храме культа было обнаружено лежбище гротескно огромного монстра... пустое. Тварь так и не отыскали. Если Император был милостив к Даргонусу, она сгинула в одним из пожаров, что во множестве охватывали ульи в тот цикл.{/n}

{n}Only one thing filled the Rogue Trader's servants with unease. Inside the cult's main temple, they found the den of some grotesquely enormous monster — it was empty. They did not find the beast. If the Emperor had been merciful to Dargonus, the monster would surely have perished in the fires that had engulfed the hives during that cycle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лишь одно тревожило слуг Вольного Торговца. В главном храме культа было обнаружено лежбище гротескно огромного монстра... пустое. Тварь так и не отыскали. Если Император был милостив к Даргонусу, она сгинула в одним из пожаров, что во множестве охватывали ульи в тот цикл.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Only one thing made the Rogue Trader's servants feel uneasy. Inside the main temple of cult, they have found a rookery of a grotesquely enormous monster — that was empty. They did not find the monster. If the Emperor had been merciful to Dargonus, then the monster had perished in the fires that had engulfed the hives during that cycle.{/n}

They did not find the beast. If the Emperor had been merciful to Dargonus, then the monster had perished in the fires that had engulfed the hives during that cycle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}只有一件事让行商浪人的仆人们忧心忡忡。在邪教的主神殿里，执法者发现了某种畸形巨怪的巢穴，而巢穴内部却空空如也，行商浪人的仆人并没有找到那头怪物。如果帝皇愿对达戈努斯大发仁慈，那头怪物或许已经死在了巢都的熊熊烈焰之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Only one thing filled the Rogue Trader's servants with unease. Inside the cult's main temple, they found the den of some grotesquely enormous monster — it was empty. They did not find the beast. If the Emperor had been merciful to Dargonus, the monster would surely have perished in the fires that had engulfed the hives during that cycle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}只有一件事让行商浪人的仆人们忧心忡忡。在邪教的主神殿里，执法者发现了某种畸形巨怪的巢穴，而巢穴内部却空空如也，行商浪人的仆人并没有找到那头怪物。如果帝皇愿对达戈努斯大发仁慈，那头怪物或许已经死在了巢都的熊熊烈焰之中。{/n}
{n}只有一件事让行商浪人的仆人们忧心忡忡。在邪教的主神殿里，执法者发现了一座孵化场，用来孵化某种畸形的巨怪，但孵化场却空空如也，行商浪人的仆人并没有找到那头怪物。如果帝皇愿对达戈努斯大发仁慈，那头怪物或许已经死在了巢都的熊熊烈焰之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solo una cosa inquietaba a los sirvientes {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente: en el templo principal del culto, encontraron la guarida de un monstruo enorme y grotesco, totalmente vacía. No encontraron a la bestia. Si el Emperador ha sido misericordioso con Dargonus, la criatura habrá muerto entre las llamas que engulleron las colmenas durante ese ciclo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Only one thing filled the Rogue Trader's servants with unease. Inside the cult's main temple, they found the den of some grotesquely enormous monster — it was empty. They did not find the beast. If the Emperor had been merciful to Dargonus, the monster would surely have perished in the fires that had engulfed the hives during that cycle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solo una cosa inquietaba a los sirvientes {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente: en el templo principal del culto, encontraron la guarida de un monstruo enorme y grotesco, totalmente vacía. No encontraron a la bestia. Si el Emperador ha sido misericordioso con Dargonus, la criatura habrá muerto entre las llamas que engulleron las colmenas durante ese ciclo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}唯一、ローグトレーダーの従者たちを不安にさせたことがあった。彼らは、カルトの本殿の中で、グロテスクで巨大な怪物の孵化装置を発見したのだ...中は空だった。獣が見つかることはなかった。皇帝がダルゴナスに慈悲を示したとすれば、その怪物はそのサイクル中にハイヴを飲み込んだ業火で焼け死んだに違いない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Only one thing filled the Rogue Trader's servants with unease. Inside the cult's main temple, they found the den of some grotesquely enormous monster — it was empty. They did not find the beast. If the Emperor had been merciful to Dargonus, the monster would surely have perished in the fires that had engulfed the hives during that cycle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}唯一、ローグトレーダーの従者たちを不安にさせたことがあった。彼らは、魔女団の本殿の中で、グロテスクで巨大な怪物の孵化装置を発見したのだ...中は空だった。獣が見つかることはなかった。皇帝がダルゴナスに慈悲を示したとすれば、その怪物はそのサイクル中にハイヴを飲み込んだ業火で焼け死んだに違いない。{/n}
{n}唯一、ローグトレーダーの従者たちを不安にさせたことがあった。彼らは、魔女団の本殿の中で、グロテスクで巨大な怪物の孵化装置を発見したのだ...中は空だった。獣が見つかることはなかった。皇帝がダルゴナスに慈悲を示したとすれば、その怪物はそのサイクル中にハイヴを飲み込んだ業火で焼け死んだに違いない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une seule chose inquiète les serviteurs {mf|du|de la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} : à l'intérieur du grand temple du culte, ils découvrent le nid d'un énorme monstre hideux... vide. La créature reste introuvable. Si l'Empereur a eu pitié de Dargonus, alors le monstre a péri dans les flammes qui ont ravagé les ruches lors de ce cycle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Only one thing filled the Rogue Trader's servants with unease. Inside the cult's main temple, they found the den of some grotesquely enormous monster — it was empty. They did not find the beast. If the Emperor had been merciful to Dargonus, the monster would surely have perished in the fires that had engulfed the hives during that cycle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une seule chose inquiète les serviteurs {mf|du|de la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} : à l'intérieur du grand temple du culte, ils découvrent le nid d'un énorme monstre hideux... vide. La créature reste introuvable. Si l'Empereur a eu pitié de Dargonus, alors le monstre a péri dans les flammes qui ont ravagé les ruches lors de ce cycle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nur eine Kleinigkeit weckte in den Dienern {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} Unbehagen. Im Haupttempel des Kultes stießen sie auf das verlassene Versteck eines riesigen Monsters. Das Ungeheuer selbst fanden sie nicht. Wäre der Imperator gnädig mit Dargonus gewesen, hätte das Monster in den Flammen sein Leben gelassen, die in diesem Zyklus in den Makropolen gewütet hatten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Only one thing filled the Rogue Trader's servants with unease. Inside the cult's main temple, they found the den of some grotesquely enormous monster — it was empty. They did not find the beast. If the Emperor had been merciful to Dargonus, the monster would surely have perished in the fires that had engulfed the hives during that cycle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nur eine Kleinigkeit weckte in den Dienern {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} Unbehagen. Im Haupttempel des Kultes stießen sie auf das verlassene Versteck eines riesigen Monsters. Das Ungeheuer selbst fanden sie nicht. Wäre der Imperator gnädig mit Dargonus gewesen, hätte das Monster in den Flammen sein Leben gelassen, die in diesem Zyklus in den Makropolen gewütet hatten.{/n}

{n}Nur eines ließ die Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ein wenig Unbehagen verspüren. Im Haupttempel des Kults fanden sie eine Brutstätte für ein grotesk großes Monster, gewaltig — und sie war leer. Das Ungeheuer fanden sie nicht. Wenn der Imperator gnädig mit Dargonus gewesen war, dann war das Monster in dem Feuer umgekommen, das in diesem Zyklus in den Makropolen gewütet hatte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hür Tacir'in hizmetkârlarını yalnızca tek bir şey huzursuz etti. Tarikatın ana tapınağının içinde devasa boyutlarda grotesk bir canavarın yuvasını boş bir hâlde buldular. Yaratık ise görünürlerde yoktu. Eğer ki İmparator, Dargonus'a merhamet ettiyse o hâlde yaratık da o döngü içinde kovanları saran alevlerde nihayetine ermiş olmalıydı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Only one thing filled the Rogue Trader's servants with unease. Inside the cult's main temple, they found the den of some grotesquely enormous monster — it was empty. They did not find the beast. If the Emperor had been merciful to Dargonus, the monster would surely have perished in the fires that had engulfed the hives during that cycle.{/n}
